content.html: Lockdowns were needed to prevent the NHS being overwhelmed by covid patients and it collapsing. The biggest mistake with them was the tories complete mishandling of them and covid in general and they saw it as a opportunity to profit from it.
content.value: Lockdowns were needed to prevent the NHS being overwhelmed by covid patients and it collapsing.  The biggest mistake with them was the tories complete mishandling of them and covid in general and they saw it as a opportunity to profit from it.
